search_results.title: Preston Perry
search_results.snippet: Preston Perry is husband to Jackie and father to Eden, Autumn, Sage, and August. He is also a poet, performance artist, teacher, and apologist.

search_results.title: Preston Perry: 'I used to try and win the argument. Now ...
search_results.snippet: Preston Perry is a walking lesson in the power of personal investment. Growing up, it was a teacher who first spotted his way with words.

search_results.title: Preston Perry Biography | Booking Info for Speaking ...
search_results.snippet: Preston Perry is a poet, performance artist, teacher, and apologist from Chicago. By the grace of God, Perry has become a formidable communicator of the gospel.
